page.title: 05Beach activities,night spots
page.content: The large expanse of sandy beach exposed at low tide makes it an ideal activity area.{Sunbathing}and{ball {games}are very popular and organised events such as{sand racing,}motor cycles and cars,{sand yachting}and occasionally{beach hockey}take place at the Braye. The occasional presence of tar and the noise of jet aircraft taking off are the only detrimental features of the beach. { { Restaurant}or{Snack facilities}and public toilets are provided at Sands, The Watersplash, El Tico and The Braye. Each centre has its own atmosphere and speciality: {Sands}is a disco and nightspot,{The Watersplash } has 2 bars with pool tables, darts and serves barbecue food and{El Tico}is renowned for its wholefood snacks and teas.
